phrases: JIOR, a proponent of peace through neutrality, had enjoyed economic prosperity,
but came under sudden, overwhelming attack by the Dorssia Military Pact Federation.
The JIOR government quickly conceded to their demand of unconditional surrender,
but Haruto Tokishima, a student in the developing colony of Module 77,
climbed aboard the Valvrave, a mysterious weapon, and drove off the Dorssian forces.
Dorssia and ARUS are now in a contest to determine who will control the Valvrave.
As a result of the declaration by Shoko Sashinami, the daughter of JIOR's president,
their school has become an independent country.
Will she make the perfect guinea pig?
People all around the world will hear my songs.
And if it will make me special, I will do anything!
You had no idea what would happen!
How could you give up your humanity?
Think about all the people you care about whose hearts you are going to break!
I do not have anyone that I care about.
I swear, my parents were like poison.
The only way I had to escape from them, from that lousy world, was to become famous.
I do not care what happens to me.
I do not have any family or friends.
Is there anything I can do?
You are a genuinely nice guy, are not you, Haruto?
I look forward to working with you, Miss Nanami.
After all, you are the representative of the newborn JIOR.
Its a teacher's job to lead her pupils, is not it?
I will see you on the moon, then.
Right... the one that is one level further down...
I check these numerical values to tweak the output of the transmitter system, right?
You have a gift for this.
You will make a fine technician.
I am saying that you have talent.
She skipped her turn on the cleaning chores rota again.
Just because she is a celebrity, she thinks she
Do not be so wound up all the time.
I will keep you girls safe.
There is too many words coming out of it.
I plugged it up for you.
I will expect to see you cheering me on in the next battle, okay?
Wow, it is fun to be a boy!
That girl was compatible with the system?
The conclusion I am led to...
Why am I being taken off the mission?!
Hey, which rank is higher, a captain or a prince?
I am relaying Captain Cain's exact words.
If you say you cannot obey, then
I am a man of Karlstein, the chosen elite.
I am well aware of the rules.
I got to say, I never took you for a bad boy.
I hope we see more, you love guru you.
It is against the rules to make a move on an idol!
What is the big idea, taking my body?!
Today, I would like to introduce you to my little sister.
Well, I call her that, but she is not my real little sister.
She is someone who means as much to me as a real little sister, though.
Do not you think it is a great idea?
I am marketing myself as the surrogate little sister of a celebrity!
I thought you said that you wanted to help me.
Besides, I paid you in advance, remember?
Tell me, Haruto, what was it like to be a lonely vampire?
Someone who is not you is posting under your name!
I do not think it is all that easy to fool the wired's retinal authentication system.
And out of all of us, she worked the hardest on the music video the other day.
Haruto would never say that one person worked harder than someone else!
A girl I made friends with recently knows all about this kind of stuff.
I will have her look into it!
You do not like it when Haruto is friendly with other girls?
It is not like we kissed or anything!
I do not know, but it sounded perverted!
And you had a perverted look on your face!
Look, I do not care about Haruto at all.
All I want is to become famous.
But you are already a star.
Are not you already plenty famous?
Why would you do something like that?
Because if you do not leave your mark on the world, you will just disappear.
We decided on it earlier, remember?
I repeat, we are under Dorssian attack!
Shall we go to the control room?
That we would hand over the robot to ARUS?
The declaration should have reached Dorssia, too.
I am trying to contact them!
There is nothing we can do.
Our Lagrange 4 forces have secured the area ahead.
I bet they just could not catch up to us.
I was hoping for a chance to catch them in a pincer movement!
They kept us waiting too long for that.
If we gave ARUS the robot, would not Dorssia surround them and give us time to escape?
I asked you to call Tokishima!
Miss Rukino, where did you get that robot?
Calling it robot or Valvrave does not fit my image.
From now on, call my Valvrave Carmilla, okay?
What are you doing in there?!
There is lots of those robots...
I gave up on expecting anything from others a long time ago.
Nobody said there was more than one of those things!
Miss Rukino, you are going out too far ahead!
Its loadout seems somewhat different, but we will proceed according to plan.
According to my analysis, the Valvrave is a close-quarters combat weapon.
In short, if it cannot get close, its combat effectiveness is cut in half.
Whittle it down bit by bit, and victory is assured!
It is no easy matter to
That is the battleship sorted out!
Why am I shaking like this?
The green one is just sitting there!
Trade places with me, you chicken!
I am sorry, are you oka...?
Hey, watch where you are going!
Takahi-senpai, why are you dressed like that?
Um, I... was asked to cheer them on, so I...
I cannot get anywhere near them!
I will not let you do your harakiri thing this time!
The instant you stop, I am going to grab you!
You are the only one who can save Haruto and us!
The eyes of the entire school are on you.
Are you going to act that pathetic when everyone is watching?
You are putting on a show!
Saki Rukino is a star, is not she?!
This audience is way too small.
After all, I am going to be the biggest star in the world!
Stream this battle to the wired.
The feed from my cockpit, too!
It is a girl this time!
No matter how many they send out.
Becoming famous is the only way!
She is no match for them!
We have to get someone else!
Look, they have her on the defensive!
We do not know that yet!
They took out that ARUS ship in the blink of an eye!
Who are you saying should pilot it, then?
You can do it, Saki Rukino!
Do not give up, Saki Rukino!
You said it yourself earlier, remember, senpai?
It is the same thing in sports!
Having a cheering section gives players a huge boost!
If that is all it took to win, we would
Do not let them beat ya, Saki Rukino!
Um, go for it... go for it...
Do not get shown up by that boy!
How can it be so manoeuvrable?!
The world that tried to kill me is now...
Bring X-eins' escape pod into hangar 2.
You are all right with this, sir?
I have another plan in motion.
For the sake of our friendship...
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
